summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Thackery Place, in the City of Seattle, from a connection with the existing sewer at East Forty-second Street and Latona Avenue to East Fiftieth Street, by constructing a sewer therein of proper dimensions and material, together with all necessary wyes, openings, manholes, catch basins and other appurtenances, in accordance with Resolution No. 1647 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
